차세대 통합 인증 솔루션을 이용하시겠습니까?-모바일: Are you looking for next-generation integrated authentication?
·공개키 기반의 FIDO 표준 인증방식 준용에 따라 패스워드 인증의 위험: Perfectly solves the risk factors of password authentication according to FIDO standard authentication method based on the secured public key
대부분의 사용자는 5개 이하의 패스워드를 사용: Most users use less than 5 passwords
50% 이상의 사용자가 5년간 패스워드를 변경한 적이 없음: More than 50% of users have never changed their passwords in 5 years
데이터 손실 80% 주요 원인은 패스워드: Passwords are the leading cause of 80% of data loss
대부분의 사용자는 여러 사이트에서 동일 패스워드 재사용: Most users reuse the same password across multiple sites
다양한 인증방식 적용한 멀티확장성: Multi-Scalability to Applicate Various AuthN Methods
원모어패스(모바일 인증장치) 하나로 다양한 인증수단 적용 및 통합된 인증: Apply various authentication methods and manage integrated authentication lifecycle with this one OMPASS (mobile authentication device).
Password-Less를 통해 비밀번호 사용·관리에 따른 보안 취약점: Through the “passwordless login”, complete removal of security vulnerabilities due to password use and management and also satisfy one's security compliance.
공개키 기반의 FIDO Alliance 국제 표준 준수: Comply with FIDO Alliance international standard based on public key.
다양한 인증방식 확장 가능: Various authentication methods can be expanded
Application of the latest various user authentication technologies based on public Key
얼굴인식, 지문인식, PIN, 패턴, Windows Hello 로그인 등: Supports various authentications such as Face Recog, Fingerprint Recog, PIN, Pattern, Windows Hello login, and more
원모어페이스 모듈적용, 한국인터넷진흥원 K-NBTC 인증, 99.96%: OMFACE module is applied, accuracy rate of 99.96% based on the test of K-NBTC from KISA
Provide separately for the centralized face authentication
사용자 통합 인증 앱 또는 SDK 제공을 통해 고객 요구 환경에 최적화된: Provides an optimized service for the environment of customer needs through user integrated authentication app or SDK
적용 시간 및 구축 업무 최소화를 위한 연동 모듈(인터페이스 서버) 제공: Provides linking module (interface server) to minimize applying time and developing work
웹기반 서비스, 윈도우즈 클라이언트, 모바일앱, 리눅스 PAM 연동 가능: Possible to link web-based service, Windows client, mobile app, Linux PAM
FIDO UAF(Universal Authentication Framew: Supports UAF (Universal Authentication Framework) and U2F (Universal Second Factor)
인터넷망·폐쇄망 환경 완벽 지원: Full support for Internet and closed network environments
전문 화이트 해커팀을 통한 모의해킹 실시 및 보안조치 완료: Conducted penetration testing through a professional white hacker team and completed security measures
FIDO2 Admin 서버 접근 시 OMPASS 2차 인증 적용2: Applied OMPASS secondary authentication whenever accessing the FIDO2 admin server
FIDO2 Admin 서버 접근 시 OMPASS 2차 인증 적용: Requires OMPASS authentication separately when accessing the admin page
비인가 접근 IP 차단: IP address block from unauthorized access
FIDO2 Admin 서버 접근 시 IP 접근통제 정책 적용: Verifies user access country that can be set by an administrator
사용자 접근 기기(브라우저) 검증 기능 적용: Verifies the user access device (or browser)
모바일 인증장치 보안성 강화: Reinforcement of mobile authentication device security
모바일 인증장치 탈옥, 위변조 및 최신버전 여부 검증 기능 적용: Verifies jailbreaking, rooting, and latest version of the mobile authentication device

U2F는 패스워드 인증이 완료된 후 OMPASS 2차 인증을 통해 최종: Universal 2nd Factor (U2F), which is also known as Two-Factor Authentication (2FA), is an authentication method that allows final login through OMPASS secondary authentication after password authentication is completed.
OMPASS 관리자 페이지에서 어플리케이션을 등록과 동시에 자동 할당된: Please check the secret key first from “Edit” that is automatically assigned when registering the application from “App Management”.
Secret Key가 외부에 노출될 경우 보안 문제가 발생하오니 절대 노: Please note that security problems may occur if the secret key is exposed to others, so make sure to be private.
server-side에서 사용자의 패스워드 인증이 완료된 후 HTTP H: Once verifying user ID is completed from the server-side, call OMPASS API including the secret key in “HTTP HEADER” and the user ID in “Request Body”.
어플리케이션에 할당된 Secret Key: Secret Key assigned to the application
Authorization 타입으로 'Bearer' 를 반드시 명시하고 ': “Bearer” is required to be specified as the authorization type, and a space is required between “Bearer” and “Secret Key”
응답받을 OMPASS URI의 초기 언어 설정 값 (KR 또는 EN): English (EN) as an Initial language setting value of OMPASS URI to recieve a response
해당 사용자의 OMPASS 등록 여부: True or false about the registration status in OMPASS
해당 사용자가 OMPASS 에 등록되어 있지 않으면 등록 페이지 URI: A URI of the registration page in case the user is not registered yet in OMPASS
해당 사용자가 OMPASS 에 등록되어 있으면 인증 페이지 URI 반환: A URI of the authentication page in case the user is already registered in OMPASS
응답받은 OMPASS URI를 브라우저(client-side)에서 호출합: The browser from client-side calls OMPASS URI that is received a response.
OMPASS 에 등록되어 있지 않은 사용자인 경우 아래와 같은 등록 팝업: In case the user is not registered in OMPASS, the following pop-up window will be displayed.

to see the instruction of registering authentication.
인증 인터페이스 호출 예시 (팝업 창): Example of authentication interface call in pop-up window
OMPASS 에 등록되어 있는 사용자인 경우 아래와 같은 인증 팝업 창이: In case the user is not registered in OMPASS, the following pop-up window will be displayed.
Notifications are sent immediately upon login.
Complete the authentication using previously selected authentication methods.
리다이렉트 URI 로 전달 받은 access_token: The access token received as a redirect URI
OMPASS 등록 또는 인증을 완료했을 때 OMPASS 페이지 팝업 창에: Whenever OMPASS registration or authentication is successfully completed, HTTP redirects to the redirect URI designated in the application at the pop-up window of the OMPASS page, and includes a Query String containing the access token.
리다이렉트된 인증 토큰을 파싱(client-side)하여 server-s: Parsing the redirected authentication token from client-side will be passing to server-side.
client-side 에서 전달받은 인증 토큰을 포함하여 OMPASS 인: The server will validate the token by calling the token validation API for OMPASS authentication including the access token passed from the client-side.
API 요청의 응답 HTTP STATUS CODE 가 200 이면 해당: If the response for HTTP STATUS CODE of the API request is 200,  login will proceed after verifying ID.
UAF 인증은 패스워드 없이 OMPASS 인증만으로 로그인이 가능한 방법: Universal Authentication Framework (UAF) is a passwordless login that allows you to simply log in via OMPASS authentication without a password.
UAF is only an optional extra.
기존의 로그인 버튼 외에 UAF 방식으로 로그인 할 수 있는 버튼을 로그: In addition to the existing login button, a button for logging in using the UAF method will be added on the login page.
When the [Password Less] button is clicked, this gives a login request to the server-side.
If the app is not up to date, an update popup window will appear.
When you download the app, the initial setup is performed.
Please proceed to the latest update and run the app.
안드로이드 전용 Play 스토어에서 원모어패스(OMPASS)를 다운로드하: Users need to download and install OMPASS from the google play store.
QR 스캔을 위한 단말의 해당 권한 요청 사항을 반드시: A permission for QR code scan from your device is required to be allowed.
Set the authentication methods for login.
생체 인증(지문, 얼굴인식), PIN CODE, 패턴 중 2가지 이상 등: Register at least two types of authentication methods from biometric authenticaiton, pin code, and pattern.
OMPASS 인증을 적용하고 있는 웹페이지에서 ID/PW 입력 후 인터페: Click the [Register 2nd AuthN] button when the pop-up window appears after entering a user ID and password.
New window containing a QR code will appear for registering the user's device for OMPASS.
Press the button in the OMPASS app.
스마트폰을 교체하거나 OMPASS 앱을 재설치 시, OMPASS 인증장치: Whenever changing the smartphone or reinstalling the OMPASS app, the corresponding user should use the OMPASS authentication device after re-registerating the device.
(사용자 관리 → 사용자 정보 삭제 시 OMPASS 인증 장치 재 등록이: (Administrator needs to delete the corresponding user information seperately from “Users Management” everytime the user replaces the smartphone or reinstalls the OMPASS app.)
OMPASS 인증을 적용하고 있는 웹페이지에서 ID/PW 입력 후 인터페:
After entering ID/PW on the web page where OMPASS authentication is applied, select the “OMPASS App” button
 when the interface pop-up window appears.
OMPASS 인증을 적용하고 있는 웹페이지에서 ID/PW 입력 하면 자동: If you enter your ID/PW on the webpage where OMPASS authentication is applied, notifications are sent automatically.
New window containing a QR code will appear and you can either authenticate via OMPASS app or QR code.
Tap on the notification of OMPASS to launch the app from your phone.
Complete the user authentication using your registered authentication method.
OMPASS 인증 알림이 오지 않는 경우: In case the notification of OMPASS does not come.
Click the “Login with QR Code” button.
iOS 전용 앱 스토어에서 원모어패스(OMPASS)를 다운로드하여 설치해: Users need to download and install OMPASS from the app store.
얼굴인식, PIN CODE, 패턴 3가지 인증방식 중 2가지 이상 등록해: Register at least two authentication methods from face, pin code, and pattern.
삭제 버튼을 누르면 해당 사용자의 정보 (OMPASS 등록 정보 및 사용: If you click the [Delete] button, the user's all information will be deleted including OMPASS app.
(사용자가 스마트폰을 교체하거나 OMPASS 앱을 재 설치 시 사용자 정: (Needs to delete user information seperately when the user replaces the smartphone or reinstalls the OMPASS app.)
OMPASS 등록 초기화 성공 시: In case of success for initializing OMPASS registration
특정 사용자가 인증장치(스마트폰 및 기타 인증장치)를 분실하였을 경우 기: If the user loses or changes the authentication device such as a smartphone, this function will help you to initialize the user's existing OMPASS registration and enable OMPASS registration again on new device.
OMPASS 등록 초기화 API를 사용하여 특정 사용자의 OMPASS 등: You can use the “API for Initializing OMPASS Registration” to initialize the user's registered information.
OMPASS 가 적용되어 있는 어플리케이션(서비스)에서 특정 사용자가 O: If the user loses or changes the authentication device such as a smartphone after completing the OMPASS registration in the application to which the OMPASS is applied, “User Initialization” can help to initialize the user's existing OMPASS registration and enables OMPASS registration again with a new authentication device.
There are two ways to initialize the user.
OMPASS ADMIN 페이지에서 해당 사용자를 삭제 시키므로 해당 사용: The user's OMPASS registration can be initialized by deleting the user from the OMPASS admin page.
(이 경우에는 해당 사용자의 모든 정보가 삭제됩니다.): However, user's all data will be deleted.
사용자 초기화 API 를 사용하여 해당 사용자의 OMPASS 등록 정보를: You can use the “User Initialization API” to initialize the OMPASS registered information for that user.
(사용자 초기화 API 는 OMPASS ADMIN 페이지에서의 다르게 해: However, “User Initialization API” only delete the information of OMPASS registration and does not delete all information of the user differently from the OMPASS admin page.
server-side에서 HTTP HEADER에는 Secret Key를: Call OMPASS API including the secret key in “HTTP HEADER” and the user ID in “Path Variable” from the server-side.

1. 개인정보의 수집 · 이용 목적: 1. Purpose of collecting and using personal information
OMPASS 관리자 사이트 및 앱 서비스 공급, 회원제 서비스 제공에 따: The Company collects and uses personal information to provide services for OMPASS admin website and OMPASS app, to identify and authenticate persons for membership-based services, to prevent the illegal use of services, to secure contact for customer support, to process complaints, to analyze members’ use of services statistically, to provide advertising information, and to provide services specific to statistical characteristics.
사이트 이용 과정에서 동의 하에 수집되는 관리자 정보: Information collected for membership sign up under agreement by administrators includes last name, first name, email, phone number, country code, and company (organization) name.
사이트 이용 과정에서 관리자에 의해 수집되는 서브 관리자 정보: Information collected for registration of sub-administrators by administrators includes last name, first name, email, phone number, and country code.
서비스 및 사이트 이용 처리 과정에서 자동생성되어 수집되는 관리자 및 서: Information collected automatically for activities of administrators and sub-administrators includes OMPASS log, policy log, login time, cookie, and access IP information.
서비스 이용 처리 과정에서 자동생성되어 수집되는 사용자 정보: Information collected automatically for activities of users includes User ID, application name, authentication, login time, cookie, and access IP information.
회원제 서비스 가입, 서비스이용, 전화상담, 이메일상담, 서비스문의, 견: Personal information is collected during the membership service sign-up process, service use, phone consultation, email consultation, service inquiry, and quotation inquiry.
4. 개인정보를 제3자에게 제공하는 경우: 4. Providing personal information to a third party
5. 개인정보의 보유 및 이용 기간: 5. Retention and use period of personal information
회사 정책 따른 정보 보유: Information retention according to policy of the Company
회원제 서비스 이용하는 이용자가 제공한 정보는 회원 가입 시점부터 탈회: The Company retains the information provided by administrator, sub administrator, and user from the time of registration to the time of membership withdrawal.
회원제 서비스 이외의 서비스의 경우, 개인정보 이용 목적이 달성되면 즉시: In the case of services other than membership, after achieving the purpose of using personal information, the information is immediately destroyed or retained according to the indicated retain period for each service.
관련 법령에 따른 정보 보유 상법 등 관련 법령의 규정에 의하여 보존할: Information retention according to relevant laws and regulations If there is a need to preserve personal information according to the provisions in laws such as the Commercial Act, however, the Company retains such in accordance with the laws and regulation.
계약 또는 청약철회 등에 관한 기록：5년: Records concerning the contract or subscription withdrawal, etc.：5 years
대금결제 및 재화 등의 공급에 관한 기록：5년: Records concerning payment and supply of goods, etc.：5 years
소비자의 불만 또는 분쟁처리에 관한 기록：3년: Records concerning consumer complaints or dispute settlement：3 years
6. 개인정보의 파기절차 및 파기방법: 6. Procedure and method for destroying personal information
개인정보 수집 및 이용목적을 달성하거나 그 보유기간이 경과된 후에는 해당: After achieving the purpose of collecting and using personal information or the retention period expires, the information is immediately destroyed. The procedure and method for destruction are as below.
수집된 개인정보는 수집목적 달성 또는 보유기간 종료 후 즉시 파기되며 관: Collected personal information is immediately destroyed after achieving the purpose of collecting or the retention period expires. If there is a need to preserve personal information according to relevant laws and regulations, the information is moved to and stored in a separate DB and destroyed after the retention period expires.
Personal information printed on a paper is destroyed with a shredder.
전자적 파일 형태로 저장된 개인정보는 기록을 재생할 수 없는 기술적 방법: Personal information saved in electronic file format is destroyed using a technical method that does not allow regeneration.
7. 이용자 및 법정대리인의 권리와 그 행사방법: 7. Rights of the users and their legal representatives and exercise of rights
이용자는 서비스 해지신청을 통해 제공한 개인정보이용에 관한 동의를 철회할: The user can withdraw his/her consent to the use of the provided personal information by requesting cancellation of the service. The Company performs the necessary action immediately when there is a request for withdrawal of consent, access, or modification and refrains from using the information until the information is corrected when there is a request for information modification in particular. Any complaints related to privacy protection arose while using the OMPASS service can be sent to the contact provided in this Privacy Policy document.
회사는 개인정보를 처리함에 있어 다음과 같이 안전성 확보에 필요한 관리적: The Company takes following administrative, technical, and physical measures to ensure safety when processing personal information.
관리적 대책：내부관리계획 수립 및 시행, 임직원에 대한 개인정보보호 정기: Administrative measures：Establishing and implementing internal management plans, regular training on personal information protection for employees, etc.
기술적 대책：개인정보처리시스템에 대한 접근권한 관리, 암호화 및 보안프로: Technical measures：Management of access permission to personal information processing system, installation of encrypt and security programs, etc.
물리적 대책：서버실, 자료보관실 등의 개인정보 보관장소에 대한 접근통제: Physical countermeasures：Access control to the storage for personal information such as server room and data storage room, etc.
9. 인터넷 접속정보파일 등 개인정보를 자동으로 수집하는 장치의 설치 ·: 9. Installation and operation of programs that automatically collect personal information and rejection of such programs
‘회사’는 이용자에게 개인화된 서비스를 제공하기 위하여 '쿠키(cooki: The Company uses cookies to provide personalized services to users. As the data file sent by the HTTP server to the user’s browser and stored in the user’s device, a cookie may contain information on the websites used by the user and personal information of the user. Users can choose to accept all cookies, receive a notification when a cookie is installed, or reject all cookies by adjusting the options of the Internet web browser.

개인정보에 관하여 궁금한 사항이 있을 경우, 언제든지 위 연락처를 통해: If you have any questions about your personal information, please contact us anytime.
기타 개인정보침해에 대한 신고나 상담이 필요하신 경우에는 아래 기관에 문: For other questions about reporting or consulting on privacy violation, please contact the following institutions in South Korea：

본 이용약관은 ㈜원모어시큐리티(이하 “회사”)가 운영하는 원모어패스(OM: These Terms of Service (“Agreement”) constitute a contract between 'OneMoreSecurity Inc.' (“Company”) who provides 'OMPASS mobile application and administrator site' (“Service”), and you. This Agreement includes and incorporates the webpage Order Form with which you purchased the Services and any subsequent Order Forms (submitted in written or electronic form). By accessing or using the Services, you agree to be bound by this Agreement. If you are entering into this Agreement on behalf of a company, organization or other entity, you represent that you have such authority to bind such entity and are agreeing to this Agreement on behalf of such entity. If you do not have such authority to enter into this Agreement or do not agree with these terms and conditions, you may not use the Services.
본 약관에서 사용되는 주요한 용어의 정의는 다음과 같습니다.
관리자(이하 “회원”)：이 약관의 내용에 동의하고 가입한 고객으로서 이용: “Customer” (“Administrator”) means the user who has agreed to this Agreement and signed up for the Services, manages sub-administrators and users, and uses the Service.
서브관리자：관리자에 의해 등록되어 이메일 본인 인증을 완료한 자로서, 서: “Sub-administrator” means the user who has registered by the Administrator and completed email verification, manages and uses the Service.
사용자：적용된 어플리케이션에 로그인을 위해 서비스를 이용하는 이용자를 말: “User” means whoever uses the Service to log in to the applied application.
사용자 아이디(이하 “ID”)：회원의 식별과 회원의 서비스 이용을 위하여: “User ID” means the unique combination of letters, numbers and special characters given to each user in order to use the Service.
비밀번호：회원의 부여받은 ID와 일치된 회원임을 확인하고 회원의 권익 보: “Password” means the unique combination of letters, numbers, and special characters selected by the user to confirm that the user matches the User ID and to protect the rights and interests of the Customer.
이용계약：서비스 및 사이트 이용과 관련하여 회사와 회원간에 체결 하는 계: “Agreement” means the contract concluded between the Company and the Customer in relation to the use of the Service.
“Withdrawal” means that the Customer cancels the contract of use.
구독 취소：정기결제를 취소하는 것을 말하며 구독 취소 후에는 사용 만료일: “Cancel Auto-Renewal” means canceling the recurring payment (subscription), and after canceling it, the Service can be used until the expiration date.
Document：회사가 서비스와 관련하여 회사가 고객에게 제공하는 안내서: “Documentation” means guides and instructions provided to Customer by the Company in connection with the Services which the Company may amend from time to time.
회사는 필요한 경우 별도로 운영정책을 공지 안내할 수 있으며, 본 약관과: If necessary, the Company may notify the “Operation Policy” to Customers separately, and if these Terms of Service overlap with the Operation Policy, the Operation Policy takes precedence.
제4조 이용계약 체결 및 구매조건: 4. AGREEMENT OF USE AND PAYMENT OF FEES
이용계약은 회원으로 등록하여 사이트를 이용하려는 관리자의 본 약관 내용에: The Agreement of Use is concluded with the consent of the administrator who intends to use the site by registering as a member to agree to the contents of these terms and conditions and the consent of the company for the application for membership.
회원(관리자)으로 등록하여 서비스를 이용하려는 자는 사이트 가입신청 시: The Customer makes the intention to agree to these Terms of Service by reading and checking the boxes when applying for registration.
결제 전 본 약관을 읽고 동의를 선택하는 것으로 구매조건 확인 및 결제진: By reading these Terms and Conditions of Service and selecting the boxes to agree before payment, the Customer makes the intention to confirm the terms of purchase and proceed with the payment.
구매조건으로서 사용자 10인 이하는 무료이며 11인 이상은 결제 후 서비: As the purchasing conditions, less than 10 users are unlimited free, and 11 or more users can use the Service after payment.
구매조건으로서 사용자 11인 이상은 결제일로 부터 월 30일 주기로 사용: As the purchasing conditions, 11 users or more can use the Service at the same time as applying for the recurring payment (subscription) by paying 2 USD per user per month (30 days).
결제완료 후 사용자 수를 변경 시 결제는 당일이 아닌 다음 결제일에 변경: When the number of users changes after the payment, the payment is calculated as the new total number of users on the next payment date.
In order to change the number of users after the Cancel Auto-Renewal, the payment should be remade in order to apply the new total number of users, and both recurring payment (subscriptionl) and a period of 30 days will be restarted from the new payment.
구독 취소를 통해 정기결제를 취소하는 경우 남은 기간 동안 서비스 및 사: Eventhough the Customer cancels the subscription by the [Cancel Auto-Renewal] button, the Service is still provided for the remaining period, and the recurring payment (subscription) will be reactivated by the new payment from that date.
결제일에 정기결제(자동결제)가 실패된 경우 월 (30일) 기간 동안 기존: Eventhough the recurring payment (subscription) fails on the payment date, the existing service will be still provicded for a month (30 days) and the payment attempt will be made once a day until then. However, in the case of PayPal, payment attempts are made up to 2 times every 5 days from the date of payment failure.
회원이 서비스 및 사이트와의 이용계약을 해지하고자 하는 경우에는 회원 본: If the Customer wants to cancel (withdraw) the Service contract, the Customer should click the [Cancel Membership] button from the “Admins Management” page.
구독 취소는 청약 철회가 아닌 정기결제를 취소하는 것을 말하며 구독 취소: “Cancel Auto-Renewal” refers to canceling the current recurring payment (subscription) which is not withdrawing the membership.
해당 결제일(결제 날짜)로부터 7일 이내에 청약 철회를 신청하면 신청일로: If the Customer wants to get a refund, It is required to click the [Refund] button from the “Billing” page within 7 days from the date of payment and 100% of the recent payment for a month will be refunded.
회원으로 등록하여 서비스 및 사이트를 이용하려는 관리자는 사이트에서 요청: The Customer who wants to use the Service is required to be registered as a member by providing the last name, first name, email address, country code, phone number and company (organization) name.
타인의 정보를 도용하거나 허위의 정보를 등록하는 등 본인의 진정한 정보를: The Customer who does not register the true information, such as identity theft or registering the false information, cannot claim any rights to the Company in relation to the use of the Service and may be punished according to relevant laws and regulations.
서비스, 사이트 및 회사는 회원가입 시 제공한 개인정보 중 비밀번호를 가: The Company do not have a password among the personal information provided at the time of membership registration, and all relevant matters follow the Privacy Policy.
회사는 관계 법령이 정하는 바에 따라 회원등록정보를 포함한 회원의 개인정: The Company strives to protect Customers' personal information, including member registration information, as stipulated by relevant laws and regulations.
회원의 개인정보보호에 관하여 관계법령 및 사이트가 정하는 개인정보처리방침: Regarding the protection of Customers' personal information, the relevant laws, regulations and the Privacy Policy set by the Company shall be followed.
단, 회원의 귀책 사유로 인해 노출된 정보에 대해 회사는 일체의 책임을: However, the company is not responsible for any information exposed due to reasons attributable to the Customer.

회사는 회원으로부터 제기되는 의견이나 불만이 정당하다고 인정할 경우에는: If the company recognizes that the opinions or complaints raised by Customers are justified, it must be dealt with as soon as possible. However, if it is difficult to process quickly due to personal circumstances, the Company will do the best to give a notice or contact to the Customer via email or phone.

However, in the event of a natural disaster or an unavoidable reason for the Service or Company, the Service may be temporarily suspended.
회원은 본 약관에서 규정하는 사항과 회사가 정한 제반 규정, 공지사항: The Customer must complies with the matters stipulated in these Terms of Service and should not against the matters set forth by the company, such as the Agreements, operating policies, and related laws and regulations.

이용고객은 아이디 및 비밀번호 관리에 상당한 주의와 책임이 필요하며, 회: The Customer requires considerable awareness and commitment to managing ID and password, and cannot provide the IDs to a third party without the consent of the Company to use them.
The customer must not infringe the intellectual property rights of the Company, Service, and third parties.
서비스 이용 시간은 업무상 또는 기술상 특별한 지장이 없는 한 연중무휴: In principle, Service Hours are 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, unless there is a special problem in business or technology. However, the Company may temporarily suspend the Service on the day or time set by the Company for regular system inspection, extension, and replacement, and please refer to the website or email in advance regarding Service suspension due to scheduled work.
단, 사이트는 다음 경우에 대하여 사전 공지나 예고 없이 서비스를 일시적: However, the Company may temporarily or permanently suspend the Service in the following cases without notice.
긴급한 시스템 점검, 증설, 교체, 고장 혹은 오동작을 일으키는 경우: In case of urgent system inspection, expansion, replacement, malfunction or crash.
국가비상사태, 정전, 천재지변 등의 불가항력적인 사유가 있는 경우: In case of force majeure such as national emergency, blackout, natural disaster, etc.
전기통신사업법에 규정된 기간통신사업자가 전기통신 서비스를 중지한 경우: When the Key Telecommunications Business Operator stipulated in the Telecommunications Business Act suspends the telecommunications service
서비스 이용의 폭주 등으로 정상적인 서비스 이용에 지장이 있는 경우: If the use of normal Service is disrupted due to heavy traffic, etc.
전항에 의한 서비스 중단의 경우 사이트는 사전에 공지사항 등을 통하여 회: In the case of Service interruption above, the Company notifies the Customer in advance through a notice or email.
회원은 다음 각호에 해당하는 행위를 하여서는 아니 되며 해당 행위를 한: The Customer shall not engage in any of the following acts, and if any of those actions are found, the Comapny may restrict the Customer's use of the service and take legal measures, and may terminate the Service contract or set a period to suspend the Service.
회원 가입시 혹은 가입 후 정보 변경 시 허위 내용을 등록하는 행위: Register the false information when registering as a member or change to false information after registration.
타인의 서비스 및 사이트 이용을 방해하거나 정보를 도용하는 행위: Interfere with others' use of Services or steal information
서비스 및 사이트의 운영진, 직원 또는 관계자를 사칭하는 행위: Impersonate the Service, Comapny, operator, staff, or related parties
서비스 및 사이트, 기타 제3자의 인격권 또는 지적재산권을 침해하거나 업: Invade on the service, site, or other third party's moral rights or intellectual property rights or interfere with business
다른 회원의 ID를 부정하게 사용하는 행위: Use another Customer's ID in private.
다른 회원에 대한 개인정보를 그 동의 없이 수집, 저장, 공개하는 행위: Collect, store, or disclose personal information about other Customers without their consent
범죄와 결부된다고 객관적으로 판단되는 행위: All actions that can be objectively judged to be related to a crime
본 서비스 및 사이트의 발생한 모든 민, 형법상 책임은 회원 본인에게 1: All civil and criminal responsibilities arising from the Service are the primary responsibility of the Customer themselves.
본 서비스 및 사이트로부터 회원이 받은 손해가 천재지변 등 불가항력적이거: The Company does not compensate for damages received by Customers from the service due to force majeure, such as natural disasters, or intentional or negligence on the part of the Customer.
회사는 회원이 사이트의 서비스 제공으로부터 기대되는 이익을 얻지 못하였거: The Company is not responsible for any damage caused by the Customer's failure to obtain the expected results from the provision of Service or the selection or use of service materials.
회사는 본 사이트의 서비스 기반 및 타 통신업자가 제공하는 전기통신 서비: The Company is not responsible for any case of failure of both the Service and the telecommunication service provided by other carriers, and any damages incurred in relation to the Service shall be governed by this Terms of Service.
회사는 회원이 저장, 등록 또는 업로드한 자료와 관련하여 일체의 책임을: The Company is not responsible for any data that has been stored, registered or uploaded by Customers.
회사는 회원의 귀책 사유로 인하여 서비스 이용의 장애가 발생한 경우에는: The Company is not responsible for any disruption in Service Use due to the reason made by Customers.
회사는 회원 상호 간 또는 회원과 제3자 상호 간, 기타 회원의 본 서비: The Company is not responsible for any activities (including data transmission and other community activities), whether between Customers, or between Customers and third parties, whether inside or outside this service.
회사는 회원이 게시 또는 전송한 자료 및 본 사이트로 회원이 제공받을 수: The Company is not responsible for any registered data such as authenticity, reliability, accuracy, etc. or transmitted by the Customer and all data that the Customer can receive through this site.

회사는 서버 등 설비의 관리, 점검, 보수, 교체 과정 또는 소프트웨어의: The Company is not responsible to Customers for any damage due to the system failure that may occur intentionally or without serious negligence equivalent to intention in the process of managing, inspecting, repairing, and replacing the equipment such as servers, or any attack by third parties, or any dissemination such as computer viruses that countermeasures have not been developed by security-related companies, or any reason on force majeure circumstances beyond the control of the administrator.

We are providing the source code of the DEMO to which the OMPASS API is applied.
㈜원모어시큐리티(이하 “회사”)가 운영하는 원모어패스 서비스는 라이선스(: During the term of your OMPASS license serviced by OneMoreSecurity Inc. (“Agreement”), the OMPASS service will be operational and available to Customer at least 99.9% of thirty days (“OMPASS SLA”). If OMPASS does not meet the OMPASS SLA, and if Customer meets its obligations under this OMPASS SLA, Customer will be eligible to receive the Service Credits described below. This OMPASS SLA states Customer's sole and exclusive remedy for any failure by OMPASS to meet the OMPASS SLA.
The contents of this Sales Level Agreement are as follows:
The following definitions shall apply to the OMPASS SLA.
“다운타임”은 고객의 모든 사용자에 대해 서비스 장애 발생율이 5%를 초: “Downtime” means when there is more than a five percent user error rate across all of a Customer’s Users. Downtime is measured based on server side error rate.
“Service” means the OMPASS FIDO authentication service.
“월별 가동율”은 30일 계약의 총 시간(분)에서 30일 계약 기간 내에: “Monthly Uptime Percentage” means the percentage of total number of minutes in thirty days contract minus the number of minutes of Downtime suffered in thirty days contract divided by tthe total number of minutes in thirty days contract.
“서비스 크레딧”은 다음과 같이 계산되며, 서비스 기간 종료 시점에 고객: “Service Credit” means the number of days of Service to be added to the end of the Service term, at no charge to Customer calculated as follows:
위에 설명된 서비스 크레딧을 받으려면 고객이 서비스 크레딧을 받을 자격이: In order to receive any of the Service Credits described above, Customer must notify OneMoreSecurity Inc. by email at service@omsecurity.kr within 30 days from the time Customer becomes eligible to receive a Service Credit. Failure to comply with this requirement will forfeit Customer's right to receive a Service Credit.
30일 계약 기간 내에 발생하는 모든 다운타임에 대해 회사가 고객에게 발: The aggregate maximum number of Service Credits to be issued by OneMoreSecurity Inc. to Customer for all Downtime that occurs in thirty days contract shall not exceed fifteen days of Service. Service Credits may not be exchanged for, or converted to, monetary amounts.
서비스 수준 협약 또는 성능 문제를 제외한 다음과 같은 경우에는 적용되지: The OMPASS SLA does not apply to any services that expressly exclude this OMPASS SLA or any performance issues
(ii) 원모어패스의 통제 범위에 속하지 않는 하나 이상의 고객 장비 또: (ii) that resulted from one or more of Customer’s equipment or third party equipment not within the primary control of OMPASS.
회사는 여기에 조건을 업데이트하여 언제든지 이 서비스 수준 협약을 수정할: OneMoreSecurity Inc. reserves the right to modify this OMPASS Service Level Agreement at any time by updating the terms on this site.
